name: fintech-fraud-detection
description: Real-time fraud detection SaaS with AI voice verification

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:fraud" "npm run dev:verification" "npm run dev:voice"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/transaction-api && npm install && cd ../fraud-detection && npm install && cd ../verification-service && npm install && cd ../ai-voice-agent && npm install && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install
